results.content: Amazing! I was trawling the WP codex for 2 hours trying to figure out how to make a PUT request at a custom endpoint. In 10 mins, this guy gave me the answer. Even for just this section, the course is worth the money, saved me a ton of time. As a JS/Frontend developer finding myself working on a WP/PHP project, its also super useful for me to see how the code is organised and the server side validation and videos on the nonce is also super useful for basic security. Finally a WP course at a higher level that tells me immediately how to do the thing I want to do with no fluff.

results.content: Like the teaching style very much. Great course so far.

results.content: Content is inconsistent with what is shown on video, difficult to follow.

response.content:
Hi Anderson,

Thank you for pointing this out. There are some inconsistencies and I am working on correcting them. 

I have now re-recorded most of the course with your feedback in min and hope you will find the course of value.

Craig
